# Protection from Charm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Wizard 2]], [[2nd Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 118

The recipient of this spell gains a resistance bonus of +1 per three caster levels (maximum +5) on any Will save against charm or compulsion spells or effects.

*Material Component:* Hair or some other small part of the body of a creature with an innate *charm* or *dominate* ability (such as a succubus or a vampire).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level.
